issue.title: Updates to Google Maps APIs Standard Plan
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Due to recent updates to Google Maps APIs Standard Plan, usage of Google APIS need now an API key.

http://googlegeodevelopers.blogspot.ch/2016/06/building-for-scale-updates-to-google.html
https://www.latecnosfera.com/2016/06/google-maps-api-error-missing-keymap-error-solved.html#how-to-fix-the-error

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The key will be a new parameter in each map. It will be applied to geoext and leaflet.
